top_procedures.description: Intravenous injection, bebtelovimab, includes injection and post administration monitoring in the home or residence; this includes a beneficiary's home that has been made provider-based to the hospital during the covid-19 public health emergency
Injection, bebtelovimab, 175 mg

Intravenous infusion or subcutaneous injection, casirivimab and imdevimab includes infusion or injection, and post administration monitoring in the home or residence; this includes a beneficiary's home that has been made provider-based to the hospital duri

Intravenous infusion, sotrovimab, includes infusion and post administration monitoring in the home or residence; this includes a beneficiary's home that has been made provider-based to the hospital during the covid-19 public health emergency

Intravenous infusion, bamlanivimab and etesevimab, includes infusion and post administration monitoring in the home or residence; this includes a beneficiary's home that has been made provider based to the hospital during the covid 19 public health emergen
Established patient office or other outpatient, visit typically 25 minutes
Measurement and recording of brain wave (EEG) activity, awake and drowsy
Established patient office or other outpatient visit, typically 15 minutes
Measurement of brain wave (EEG) activity, 41-60 minutes
Digital analysis of electrical brain wave activity (EEG)
New patient office or other outpatient visit, typically 45 minutes
Principal care management services for a single high-risk disease, first 30 minutes provided personally by qualified health care professional, per calendar month.
Nerve transmission studies, 11-12 studies
Nerve transmission studies, 13 or more studies
Initial nursing facility care with moderate level of medical decision making, per day, if using time, at least 35 minutes
Needle measurement and recording of electrical activity of muscles of arm or leg complete study
Hydration infusion into a vein 31 minutes to 1 hour
Initial nursing facility care with high level of medical decision making, per day, if using time, at least 45 minutes
Follow-up nursing facility visit per day, typically 10 minutes
Assessment of and care planning for patient with impaired thought processing, typically 50 minutes
